name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At 10 p.m. on September 30, a random stabbing incident occurred at the Walmart mall on Miaoqian Street, Songjiang District, Shanghai.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/sDhSjtmwkL

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/hj04zGSAAW

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 1, the police reported that the murderer, Lin, came to Shanghai to vent his anger over a personal financial dispute. The incident has left 18 people injured, 3 of whom died after failed rescue efforts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Wall Street Journal reported on September 30 that Israel sent ground troops to Lebanon to escalate the fight with Hezbollah.

The Israeli military said they launched a so-called limited operation against some villages near the southern border of Lebanon, aimed at striking Hezbollah's targets and infrastructure. The military said these targets "pose a direct and realistic threat to Israeli settlements on the northern border."

The ground operation followed weeks of Israeli intelligence operations, targeted eliminations and heavy bombings aimed at destroying Hezbollah's command structure, weapons and equipment and supply lines. Israel said the move was intended to end nearly a year of rocket, drone and missile attacks by Lebanese militias.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Just now (1:02 am CET on October 1), the Israeli Ministry of Defense tweeted to confirm that its ground forces launched an attack on southern Lebanon on the evening of the 30th. The Israeli Ministry of Defense stated that the attack was limited, localized and targeted, mainly against Hezbollah targets.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The British government has chartered a commercial flight out of Lebanon to assist British nationals who want to leave, the British foreign secretary said.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At this moment, Beirut Airport in Lebanon is being attacked by Israeli missiles and drones, with explosions, flames and smoke everywhere.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to the Wall Street Journal, just one day ago, on September 29, Israel dispatched drones and fighter jets to carry out air strikes on the Houthi armed forces in Yemen, with the main targets being the Houthi armed forces' oil import facilities and weapons provided by Iran. Over the past year, the Houthi armed forces have been continuously launching drones and missiles at Israel.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of September 30, in Nanning, Guangxi, a man distributed national flags for free in the square, but citizens had to step on the Japanese flags on the ground before they could receive them. Seeing this, many adults and children stepped on the Japanese flags.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 1 is China's National Day. Some foreigners also posted videos to celebrate and praise China's achievements in recent years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 1 (Released) Chinese people in San Francisco held a parade to celebrate China's National Day. A blogger said: This shows that the United States has submitted to China, and even the police are clearing the way for us.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Wu Kangren, the Golden Horse Award winner in Taiwan who once showed up to support the Sunflower Student Movement, retweeted the People's Daily's National Day congratulatory message today and captioned it: "Blessings to the splendid China." However, he was criticized by many netizens for not mentioning the word "motherland," who questioned his ambiguity and playing word games.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In August this year, foreign media reported that Putin ordered the army to regain full control of the Kursk region by October 1, and today is the last day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 30, Shanghai. The old man said that when speculating in stocks, one must follow the Party’s lead and must choose stocks controlled by the government.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 31, a netizen posted on Xiaohongshu that his undergraduate major was Chinese and Western Marxist philosophy. When he submitted his resume today and filled in his major, he found that he could not submit it because it contained the sensitive word "Marx". Some netizens also expressed the same feeling.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 1, Guangzhou, Guangdong. A man sat on the edge of the roof of the Guangzhou Tianhecheng shopping mall and was about to jump off the building, while throwing leaflets into the air.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/QVMXsv65Ji

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 1, Hangzhou, Zhejiang. A man in the West Lake Scenic Area was wearing clogs and live-streaming, and was watched and criticized by many tourists. "You are going too far. It is definitely not okay to wear this on National Day."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 1, Wenzhou, Zhejiang. A woman wearing a kimono walks on the street. The photographer said, "Is this woman sick? Wearing a kimono on National Day?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 30, Zhejiang. A woman posted a video saying that she was an emergency department nurse who had worked for 11 years. She was on the front line during the epidemic, but her current performance salary was only 2,750 yuan. The woman said that this money was not enough to pay the mortgage, let alone raise a child. "I implore the government to lend a hand and help those of us who have dedicated ourselves to the country."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 1, Sichuan. A local outlet store held a discount promotion. Customers rushed into the store to buy Nike shoes. The scene was chaotic. Netizens replied, "Why don't you boycott Nike? Have you forgotten about Xinjiang cotton?" "It seems that everyone has forgotten about the Nike Xinjiang cotton incident."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 1, Beijing. A digital blogger posted that a group of friends in the chat group just bought a PSD material of a "Kongming Lantern" and received a call from the police station and were told that they could not release the Kongming Lantern. The police station said "This is keyword monitoring." The netizen said "Living in Beijing, there is no privacy."
